column6: directive[n]1.The EU has issued a new set of directives on pollution.
column12: means[n]1.Television is an effective means of communication.
column15: means[n]2.People should pay according to their means.
column18: such as 1.Wild flowers such as primroses are becoming rare.
column21: such as 2.Opportunities such as this did not come every day.

column35: reference[n]3.The emergency nurse can treat minor injuries without reference to a doctor.
column38: reference[v]1.Each chapter is referenced| citing literature up to 2004.

column43: particular[adj]2.[명사 앞에만 씀](보통보다 더 많거나 대단하여)특별한

column47: particular[adj]3.She's very particular about her clothes.
